Sentencas: Gadoliniumand samariumco-doped ceria electrolyte materials Ce0.8-xGdxSm0.2O2-delta (x= 0, 0.02, 0.04, 0.06) were prepared by using sol-gel method.
Titulo: Thermal and Electrical properties of Ce0.8-xGdxSm0.2O2-δ materials for SOFC applications

Sentencas: The prepared materials were characterized by X-ray diffraction and scanning electronmicroscopy.
Titulo: Thermal and Electrical properties of Ce0.8-xGdxSm0.2O2-δ materials for SOFC applications

Sentencas: The phase identification and the cell parameters were determined by X-ray powder diffraction.
Titulo: Thermal and Electrical properties of Ce0.8-xGdxSm0.2O2-δ materials for SOFC applications

Sentencas: Thermal expansion of prepared materials was measured using dilatometric method in the temperature range 30-1000 degrees C.
Titulo: Thermal and Electrical properties of Ce0.8-xGdxSm0.2O2-δ materials for SOFC applications

Sentencas: The thermal expansion increases linearly increasing temperature.
Titulo: Thermal and Electrical properties of Ce0.8-xGdxSm0.2O2-δ materials for SOFC applications

Sentencas: The electrical conductivity was measured using impedance spectroscopy.
Titulo: Thermal and Electrical properties of Ce0.8-xGdxSm0.2O2-δ materials for SOFC applications

Sentencas: Among the prepared compositions, Ce0.74Gd0.06Sm0.2O2-delta showed higher electrical conductivity and lower activation energy at 450 degrees C. Which makes suitable as an electrolyte and it may be a promising candidate for as an electrolyte in IT-SOFCs.
Titulo: Thermal and Electrical properties of Ce0.8-xGdxSm0.2O2-δ materials for SOFC applications
